attributes.action: commission a national corpus of texts and tapes used in crime for forensic detection services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the prime minister to use part of his remaining months in office to set in motion the necessary framework to initiate a national, limited-access major corpus of criminal language, from ransom notes to text messages to chatroom logs, emails, etc., used in crime to enable the improved analysis and or detection of criminal allegations, by forensic linguists, phoneticians and document examiners.
